Detailed Description

Simple Descriptor.

Mandatory for each endpoint present in the node.

Definition at line 165 of file appFramework.h.

Field Documentation

Endpoint_t SimpleDescriptor_t::endpoint

ID of the endpoint within the node to which this description refers. Applications shall only use endpoints 1-240.

Definition at line 169 of file appFramework.h.

Profile that is supported on this endpoint.

Definition at line 177 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t SimpleDescriptor_t::AppInClustersCount

Number of input clusters supported on this endpoint. If 0, the application input cluster list field shall not be included.

Definition at line 180 of file appFramework.h.

ClusterId_t* SimpleDescriptor_t::AppInClustersList

List of input clusters supported on this endpoint.

Definition at line 182 of file appFramework.h.

uint8_t SimpleDescriptor_t::AppOutClustersCount

Number of output clusters supported on this endpoint. If 0, the application output cluster list field shall not be included.

Definition at line 185 of file appFramework.h.

List of output clusters supported on this endpoint.
